name: grGRIDid
description:
Navigate a maze of twists, turns and perspectives in this short puzzle game.

Note: there is a bug that I wasn’t able to fix during development time, in which you’re able to walk on thin air when on the smallest scale. You’re on your honour not to cheese the entire game with it! (It would be a bit boring, anyway.)

Controls

Move with arrow keys.
Spin grid with spacebar.
Restart level with R.

grGRIDid was made for Ludum Dare 48.
You can get the source code here.
